Uses of Package
com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler

Packages that use com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler
com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler   
com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler.ext   
 

Classes in com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler used by com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler
ChoiceIdentifier
          This class is used to uniquely identify a policy choice to facilitate the policy selection process by policy handler at runtime.
PolicyChoices
          This class contains normalized policy choices and related information to be used by WSPHandlerFactory.
PolicyHandlerFactoryCapability
          This class specifies the top level policy assertions that can be processed by a policy handler factory.
WSPHandlerChainFactory
          HandlerFactory implementation that creates WSPHandlers in one chain.
WSPHandlerFactory
          This is the main interface for creating a policy handler based on WS-Policy.
 

Classes in com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler used by com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler.ext
PolicyChoices
          This class contains normalized policy choices and related information to be used by WSPHandlerFactory.
WSPHandlerFactory
          This is the main interface for creating a policy handler based on WS-Policy.
